name: Double Trouble
overview: This appealing game enables two players or one player versus VIC to enter a high speed world where reactions and judgement are paramount to survival. Players must deflect their ball into fruit-like objects that appear despite "Schizophrenic Spike" who roams the play area. The game would be simple but for the growing walls and court boundaries and Be thankful this is only a game!! For the unexpanded VIC, has high speed machine code action for 1 or 2 players, with numerous options of play. * Score display * Life display
